title: Did first female-majority legislature in US make a difference?
description: Nevada became the first state with a female-majority legislature. Did it make a difference?

title: New Jersey police race to pull driver from burning lorry
description: The driver was rescued from the cab seconds before it exploded. He escaped with minor injuries.

title: Coronavirus: Major sponsors pull staff from attending Crufts
description: The annual dog show, which starts on Thursday, will go ahead with "enhanced measures" to protect visitors.

title: Dad rescues son who fell into hole while skiing in Alps
description: Eleven-year-old Fox Campbell became trapped under 5ft of snow when off-piste in the French Alps.

title: Deep listening: Finding common ground with opponents
description: How deep listening without interruption or judgement can help us find common ground and feel valued.

title: Three days more sick pay to tackle virus spread
description: Workers will get statutory sick pay from the first day off work, Boris Johnson tells the Commons.

title: Chris Ashton: Harlequins sign former England winger after Sale exit
description: Former England winger Chris Ashton joins Harlequins two days after leaving Premiership rivals Sale Sharks.

title: Coronavirus: Men wanted over 'racist' Oxford Street attack on student
description: Student Jonathan Mok was beaten and punched in the attack on Oxford Street in London.

title: Genesis reunite for first tour in 13 years

title: Afghan conflict: US conducts first air strike on Taliban since deal
description: It comes just hours after President Trump talked with the group about keeping peace efforts on track.

title: Ronan and Dylan Farrow attack publisher Hachette over Woody Allen memoir
description: Woody Allen's son is "disappointed" that his own publisher will also release his father's book.

title: Teams formally object to Ferrari engine settlement
description: Seven of the 10 Formula 1 teams formally objected to the handling of the controversy over last year's Ferrari engine.

title: Caroline Flack: CPS to review decision to prosecute TV star
description: The Love Island star was awaiting trial for an assault charge when she took her own life.

title: Spitting Image to return on BritBox, 24 years after the TV show ended
description: The satirical puppet show has Harry and Meghan in its sights, 24 years after it was last on screens.

title: It will be a 'shame' if forecast rain knocks England out of T20 World Cup - Knight
description: England captain Heather Knight says it would be "a shame for the tournament" if rain ruins the Women's T20 World Cup semi-finals in Sydney on Thursday.

description: How India's 16-year-old Shafali Verma is taking the T20 World Cup by storm.

description: A team-mate's shot left Great Britain forward Sam Ward virtually blind in one eye, but after returning to action for his club, he is now aiming for the 2020 Olympics.

description: An initiative in the state of Rio de Janeiro aims to improve the lives of those behind bars.

title: Antarctic sea creatures 'stressed to the max'

title: 'I have sensation in my breasts again'
